name: bluesky-boot.core.log-except-exception-list
description: Exception log 제외 대상 목록 로그 확인이 불필요한 에러 항목에 대해 exception log 제외 처리 목록을 추가하고자 하는 경우 bluesky-boot.core.log-except-exception-additional-list로 설정하면 합산처리 됨.

name: bluesky-boot.core.module-name-set
description: 별다른 설정 없이 moduleName만 지정하고자 하는 경우 사용

name: bluesky-boot.core.properties
description:
개별적으로 선언해서 사용하고자 하는 변수가 있는 경우 저장하는 map
parent의 값을 module이 상속받아 사용함

name: bluesky-boot.core.resolve-type
description: Define module invocation criteria [domain (default), addPathPattern, moduleNameResolver]

name: bluesky-boot.web.domain.add-path-patterns
description: When using multi-modules, if you make an add-path-pattern declaration, you need an addPathPatterns declaration for each module. Registering the AntPathMatcher Pattern

name: bluesky-boot.web.domain.dev-domain-list
description: When declared and used by domain in a multi-module project, the domain is a variable for local development that is set aside for development purposes. You can use development domains in the form of a list by declaring them in succession with ",". ex) devDomainList=http://local.a.com,http://local.b.com

name: bluesky-boot.web.domain.exclude-path-list
description: List of exception paths (list that are not redirect targets)

name: bluesky-boot.web.domain.mobile-web-list
description: Use the mobile web address for your site if it is multi-use Mobile web address must be declared if there is a PC web/mobile web distinction Used separately in unified notification processing

name: bluesky-boot.web.domain.request-path
description: Set the request root path Default is "/" (full)

name: bluesky-boot.web.domain.static-path-list
description: List of static paths (not redirect targets)

name: bluesky-boot.web.domain.web-list
description: If the site address is multi, use. If your site doesn't have a PC web/mobile web distinction, declare only WEB and use it.

name: bluesky-boot.web.not-supported-browser-exclude-path-patterns
description: Registering an exception address pattern when checking for unsupported browsers
